name: Pacifism
text: Give to the Simon Williams jugador. Wonder Man cannot attack. Acción de Alter ego: Exhaust Simon Williams o descarta 3 cards tucked under Ionic Physiology → descarta esta carta.

name: Grim Reaper
text: Ataque veloz. [star] Respuesta obligada: After Grim Reaper ataca y defeats an ally, inflige that ally's controller a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "si only you were my real brother...instead of this monstrosity you've become." —Grim Reaper
name: Brother vs. Brother
text: As an additional cost to attack Grim Reaper, you must descarta 1 carta de tu mano.

flavor: "Nothing will get in my way!" —Grim Reaper
name: Scythe Strike
text: Cuando se muestre esta carta: si Grim Reaper está en juego, he se activa contra ti. De no ser posible, sufres 2 de Daño indirecto.

name: Death Cannot Die
text:
Cuando se muestre esta carta: Grim Reaper se activa contra ti. si Grim Reaper is not in play, find him y reveal him.
[star] Aumento: si Grim Reaper está en juego, he se activa contra ti (después this activation).
